title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Whenever used in this Part unless otherwise expressly
stated or unless the context requires a different meaning, the following terms
shall have the meanings set forth or indicated: (a) Commissioner means the Commissioner of

Transportation of the State of New York. (b) Department means the New York State

Department of Transportation. (c) Carrier means any person or corporation described in section
508.1
of this Part. (d) Self-insurer means any carrier who
adjusts and is ultimately liable for payment of all or part of the bodily
injury, property and/or cargo damage claims resulting from the operation, maintenance or use of a motor vehicle. (e) Self-insurance fund means a deposit in a

New York State bank or trust company consisting of cash or government
securities to be used for payment of bodily injury, property and/or cargo
claims or judgments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
508.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
